post.description: The "Create Price for a Product" API allows adding a new price associated with a specific product to the system. Use this endpoint to create a price with the specified details for a particular product. Ensure that the required information is provided in the request payload.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be used

get.description: The "List Prices for a Product" API allows retrieving a paginated list of prices associated with a specific product. Customize your results by filtering prices or paginate through the list using the provided query parameters.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be used

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be included in a single page of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the location.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: To filter the response only with the given price ids, Please provide with comma separated

get.summary: Get Price by ID for a Product
get.description: The "Get Price by ID for a Product" API allows retrieving information for a specific price associated with a particular product using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to fetch details for a single price based on the provided price ID and product ID.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be used

parameters.name: priceId
parameters.description: ID of the price that needs to be returned

put.summary: Update Price by ID for a Product
put.description: The "Update Price by ID for a Product" API allows modifying information for a specific price associated with a particular product using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to update details for a single price based on the provided price ID and product ID.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be used

parameters.name: priceId
parameters.description: ID of the price that needs to be returned

delete.summary: Delete Price by ID for a Product
delete.description: The "Delete Price by ID for a Product" API allows deleting a specific price associated with a particular product using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to remove a price from the system.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be used

parameters.name: priceId
parameters.description: ID of the price that needs to be returned

get.description: The "Get Product by ID" API allows to retrieve information for a specific product using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to fetch details for a single product based on the provided product ID.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be returned

delete.description: The "Delete Product by ID" API allows deleting a specific product using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to remove a product from the system.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be returned

put.description: The "Update Product by ID" API allows modifying information for a specific product using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to update details for a single product based on the provided product ID.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product that needs to be returned

post.description: The "Create Product" API allows adding a new product to the system. Use this endpoint to create a product with the specified details. Ensure that the required information is provided in the request payload.

get.description: The "List Products" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of products. Customize your results by filtering products based on name or paginate through the list using the provided query parameters. This endpoint provides a straightforward way to explore and retrieve product information.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be included in a single page of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: LocationId is the id of the sub-account

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name of the product for searching.

bearer.name: Authorization
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency.

message.example: Invalid token: access token is invalid

interval.description: The interval at which the recurring event occurs.

intervalCount.description: The number of intervals between each occurrence of the event.

_id.description: The unique identifier for the membership offer.

stripePriceId.description: The Stripe price ID associated with the price.

internalSource.description: The internal source of the price.

amount.description: The amount of the price. ( min: 0.01 )

recurring.description: The recurring details of the price (if type is recurring).

description.description: A brief description of the price.

membershipOffers.description: An array of membership offers associated with the price.

trialPeriod.description: The trial period duration in days (if applicable).

totalCycles.description: The total number of billing cycles for the price. ( min: 1 )

setupFee.description: The setup fee for the price.

variantOptionIds.description: An array of variant option IDs associated with the price.

compareAtPrice.description: The compare at price for the price.

locationId.description: The unique identifier of the location associated with the price.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the price.

meta.description: Additional metadata associated with the price.

trackInventory.description: Need to track inventory stock quantity

allowOutOfStockPurchases.description: Continue selling when out of stock

_id.description: The unique identifier for the price.

membershipOffers.description: An array of membership offers associated with the price.

variantOptionIds.description: An array of variant option IDs associated with the price.

locationId.description: The unique identifier for the location.

product.description: The unique identifier for the associated product.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user.

type.description: The type of the price (e.g., one_time).

currency.description: The currency code for the price.

recurring.description: The recurring details of the price (if type is recurring).

createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the price.

updatedAt.description: The last update timestamp of the price.

compareAtPrice.description: The compare-at price for comparison purposes.

trackInventory.description: Indicates whether inventory tracking is enabled.

allowOutOfStockPurchases.description: Continue selling when out of stock
